description: The doctor/patient relationship is a delicate thing.  There are things only one's doctor knows.  There are experiences shared of which that no one else should learn.  Dr. Cody Cummings runs a special kind of practice where each of his patients understand that nothing leaves the office.  That's why Brittney Bunny has stopped in today.Brittney is an active young woman, both sexually and athletically.  Her visit today is regarding a sore knee.  After performing a quick examination, Dr. Cummings doesn't find anything out of the ordinary.  Brittney also is complaining of some shoulder pain.  As the doctor takes a close look, he feels Brittney's pulse rate increasing.  He soon detects her breathing has become quicker and more shallow.  He finds his hands wandering as if they belong to someone else, soon finding their way to Brittney's full breasts.  They grope and gently squeeze.  Young Brittney reciprocates by moving her face closer to her doctor's.  They kiss and the doctor's mind is filled with a possible course of events that send blood rushing to his cock.  He imagines her moist lips wrapped around his erection and her bare ass cheeks in his hands.  And then he imagines thrusting into her, succumbing to base desire, and breaking all the rules. Enjoy!
title: Medisin Man
